Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Jeffery's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Jeffery joined a community called the Alexandria Safe Zone . As the Wolves invade Alexandria, ransacking homes and murdering residents, Jeffery tries to find safety but gets his throat slashed by a Wolf, killing him. He eventually reanimates and roams through the streets of the community before Morgan puts him down. The next day, Jeffery's body is gathered by Tobin and Bruce and buried along with the other slain Alexandrians. His name is then added to the memorial wall by Betsy and two other women .
Death[]: Killed By Aaron (Indirectly Caused) Aaron leaves his backpack at Del Arno Foods, which causes the Wolves to locate and attack Alexandria. The Wolves (Alive) As the Wolves make their way into Alexandria, Jeffery is one of the many residents to be killed. Morgan Jones (Zombified) A zombified Jeffery is put down by Morgan as he inspects the carnage in Alexandria.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Jeffery has killed: Possibly a few zombies
Trivia[]: Similar to how the recurring extras killed off in "JSS" got their names, many of the stunt people who portrayed Alexandrians killed by the Wolves were named based off the first letter of their real name, such as Jeffery and Jackson Ward. Jeffery is the first named character to be killed by Morgan Jones on-screen in the TV Series , albeit zombified.
Name: Jeffery
